Class InstantRunoff

  • java.lang.Object
    • Election
      • InstantRunoff
  • public class InstantRunoff
extends Election
    Implements functionality to simulate InstantRunoff election. Selects a candidate based on majority of votes. If no clear winner is present, the program removes the candidate with the lowest votes and redistributes them. In case of a tie, the program randomly selects a winner.

      • Fields inherited from class Election

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstantRunoff

        public InstantRunoff​(int totalVotes,
                     java.util.List<Ballot> ballots,
                     java.util.List<IRCandidate> candidates,
                     java.util.List<Ballot> invalid_ballots,
                     Audit auditFile)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for the InstantRunoff.
        Parameters:
        totalVotes - The number of total votes.
        ballots - A list of ballots containing voting information.
        candidates - A list of candidates' names in the election.
        invalid_ballots - A list of ballots that have less than half of candidates ranked.
        auditFile - Output file contaning the results of the election.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that the file cannot be opened, or the text cannot be written to the file.
